headline: Pfizer Inc. (PFE) Finalizes Global Licensing Agreement with 3sbio, Inc.
summary: Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) is among the 12 Best Ethical Companies to Invest in 2025. On July 24, 2025, Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) finalized the global licensing agreement with 3SBio, Inc. With this agreement, PFE acquired the exclusive rights to develop, manufacture, and commercialize 3SBio’s SSGJ-707, a bispecific antibody for PD-1 and VEGF. Leveraging 3SBio’s proprietary CLF2 […]
